text: The results revealed that the mutation in EGFR exon 21 (L858R) had disappeared, and a new EGFR-KDD mutation was identified. Amplification of the cyclin-dependent kinase gene and a mutation in the SMARCA4 gene were also identified.

The ultrasonography revealed the patent's artificial vessels and ascites. The contrast-enhanced computed tomography (CT) scan showed multiple, small, hypervascular lesions. The alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) level was normal (at 2.2 ng/mL).
